title: Remove Languages/Notifications settings and add a '+' goal creation button

requirements.text: Remove the Languages and Notifications settings from the app UI by deleting their entries from the mobile bottom navigation and ensuring the bottom nav layout remains correct after removal (no empty columns or misalignment).

quotes: Et enlève réglage langues et notifications

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the bottom navigation no longer shows 'Languages' or 'Notifications'.
The bottom navigation layout adapts to the new number of items (no 7-column grid with empty space; spacing and touch targets remain consistent).
No other navigation items are removed or renamed.

requirements.text: Remove the Languages and Notifications routes so they are no longer accessible within the app navigation (i.e., the router does not register '/languages' or '/notifications').

quotes: Et enlève réglage langues et notifications

acceptanceCriteria: The router no longer defines routes for '/languages' and '/notifications'.
Navigating to '/languages' or '/notifications' via manual URL entry does not render the removed placeholder pages (it should fall back to the router's default not-found/route-missing behavior).
No other routes are impacted (e.g., '/', '/create', '/stats', '/settings', '/profile', '/averages' continue to work).

requirements.text: Add a clearly discoverable '+' button to let users add goals, which navigates to the existing Create Goal flow at route '/create'.

quotes: mes un + pour ajouter les objectifs

acceptanceCriteria: A '+' (plus) control is visible from the goals dashboard experience and is usable on mobile.
The existing Create Goal page and goal creation flow remain unchanged and continue to work.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Implementing real notification preferences, scheduling, or delivery.
Adding new backend data models for settings.
